name: GridDrill
description: The Goal of GridDrill is simple, get the treasure locked at the bottom of a grid of various tiles. To unlock the last row of each map, you need to collect a number of keys scattered across the grid. After you've collected all the keys, the row is unlocked and you can attempt to find the treasure. Along the way, you'll find other helpful things such as money and more oïl to help you drill some more. Monsters and hard blocks will hinder your progression as well.
